casebody.data:
Third Department,

May, 1958

(May 23, 1958) In the Matter of Saul Wolf, on Behalf of Himself and All Other Persons Similarly Situated, Appellant, against Paul D. Appleby, as Director of the Budget of the State of New York, Respondent.

Motion for reargument, or in the alternative, for permission to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied, without costs. Bergan, J. P., Gibson, Herlihy and Reynolds, JJ., concur.
